channel.title: Blip map problems [317]
channel.description:
I'm currently working on a project of min that uses Swat's Client 2010. I thought the interface really didn't really suit the client so I edited it using Tom's Cache Unpacker. I finished the client (sort of) and I ended up with something like this. [img]http://chaosscape.net/preview/fluffydogs01.png[/img] The compass isn't showing up at all and the blip map is white and my dot and other dots smear the blip map. I have a feeling I've come across this problem before but I forgot how I fixed it.
Edit: I have a feeling that last time I had to make the white transparent but it couldn't be done via photoshop but by using a special pink-ish colour? But I forgot the colour code number. :(

item.title: Blip map problems [317]
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

Thanks

ummmm…
It fixed the problem but created a different problem with the alignment of the blip map and compass.

Read full topic

item.title: Blip map problems [317]
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

It’s pure pink. RGB(255, 0, 255) or Hex(0xFF00FF)

Read full topic

@EwfsPrince wrote:

I’m currently working on a project of min that uses Swat’s Client 2010. I thought the interface really didn’t really suit the client so I edited it using Tom’s Cache Unpacker.
I finished the client (sort of) and I ended up with something like this.

The compass isn’t showing up at all and the blip map is white and my dot and other dots smear the blip map.
I have a feeling I’ve come across this problem before but I forgot how I fixed it.
